body: Since they were one of my first scanlators I started following I didn't notice at first but... SaHa was a REALLY bad editor/cleaner.
It so sad its a bitter story of a brother who gets his sister to fall in love with him unintentionally hence the endin "oniichan take me with you" it so sad...
Lol, somehow, the exaggerated shadows makes it funny to look at, not bad though
